LexiconNames.description: List of one or more pronunciation lexicon names you want the service to apply during synthesis. Lexicons are applied only if the language of the lexicon is the same as the language of the voice. For information about storing lexicons, see PutLexicon.

OutputFormat.description: The audio format in which the resulting stream will be encoded.

SampleRate.description: The audio frequency specified in Hz.  The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are '8000', '16000', and '22050'. The default value is '22050'.   Valid values for pcm are '8000' and '16000' The default value is '16000'.

Text.description: Input text to synthesize. If you specify ssml as the TextType, follow the SSML format for the input text.

TextType.description: Specifies whether the input text is plain text or SSML. The default value is plain text. For more information, see Using SSML.

VoiceId.description: Voice ID to use for the synthesis. You can get a list of available voice IDs by calling the DescribeVoices operation.
